hero.title: Hi, I am
hero.description: I am passionate about frontend development. I create eye-catching and functional interfaces using React, TypeScript, and modern UI/UX designs. I am focused on continuous learning and self-improvement.

about.me: Hello! I'm Ece. I'm passionate about frontend development. I create projects with React, TypeScript, and modern UI/UX approaches. I love the cyberpunk style and structures that look beautiful yet simple.

items.description: Developed and maintained React applications using TypeScript, Redux, and CSS Modules. Integrated AWS IoT services with the frontend using the AWS SDK and WebSocket communication. Built Firebase-based projects with real-time data sync via Firebase Authentication and Firestore. Contributed to AI chatbot systems and IoT dashboards for smart appliance users. Worked on frontend apps connected to Express.js and Node.js backends through WebSocket. Also deployed and customized Overleaf Community Edition using Docker Compose, including essential container and package configurations.

Developed the MedSIS mobile app frontend using Flutter and built the web interface with React, utilizing tools like React Router, Axios, Bootstrap, and additional libraries for enhanced UI/UX. Created and maintained a Node.js + Express backend, integrating with MySQL via connection pooling and managing the server process using PM2. Set up and configured a Linux- based server, handling HTTPS, DNS, NGINX reverse proxying, and load balancing. Collaborated with students, administrative staff, and faculty to resolve issues related to IUEâ€™s OASIS student information system.
Developed web application with React & Redux to share helpful links within R&D team. Focused on integration with internal APIs and enhancing user experience through responsive design.

Focused on mobile and web development, worked with Flutter and Dart, and contributed to app design with real data from Firebase. Collaborated with international clients to enhance user experience and interface design.
Undergraduate education focused on software development, algorithms and systems design.
An intensive high school program with an emphasis on math and science.

items.title: Portfolio Website
items.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills, built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
